alert.note: Alert for Chemung (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 12:54AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Chemung, Bradford and west central Wyoming Counties through 145 AM EDT... At 1254 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mansfield to near Kettle Creek Gorge. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elmira, Southport, Elmira Heights, Towanda, Ridgebury, Canton, West Franklin, Troy, Wilmot and North Towanda. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 56 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
